title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furnishings/ Bed, Headboard; Dresser; Wall Decoration; Statue", ca. 1937
description: Drawings for furnishings for Harold S. Anderson house, Bel Air, CA. Dresser at left with nude figurine on surface. Two-door cabinet on dresser on left side; three open shelves on right side. Right side of desk surface and shelves have rounded edges. Design for wall decoration (?) above. Double-bed in lower right, with rough sketch of lighting attachment for headboard below. Bed is low to ground and has cylindrical pillow at head. Headboard extends past each side of bed and curves inward at each end. Side tables tucked inside curve of headboard on each side of bed. Lighting fixture attached to top of headboard at center. Long cylindrical unit with legs on each side that affix to headboard.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furnishings/ Bed, Headboard; Dresser; Wall Decoration; Statue", ca. 1937.
ca. 1937. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-304-16.
